descriptionHtml:
Have you ever been frustrated with looting the same items over and over? Wishing there was a faster way? Now there is! 

One Click Looting: Upon looting a single item (any item) from a container, every other \"desirable\" item in the container is also taken. 

Configurable in-game via reading \"A Guide to Efficient Pillaging\". This config book can be found on the very first corpse you loot when beginning a new game. Alternatively, for existing characters, Farengar Secret-Fire owns a copy. It can be found on a bookshelf in his study in Dragonsreach.

NEW: A spell has been added to allow a player to selectively turn off auto-loot for a location. Instructions can be found within the config book. This spell is learned upon reading the config book for the first time.

Categories:
- Base (Gold and lockpicks - Enabled by default)
- Ingredients
- Scrolls
- H/M/S Potions
- Gems
- Soul Gems
- Ore/Ingots
- Leather/Pelts
- Jewelry
- Arrows

DOES NOT AFFECT:
- Pickpocketing
- Companions
- Merchants
- Any player/playerFaction owned container
- A list of excluded locations (currently all player homes)

CONFLICTS:
- This mod will conflict with any merchant added by another mod, UNLESS you use the included spell to turn off auto-loot within that location. (For example, the Dovahkiin Hideout)

*****

Change Log:
v1.0
 - Initial Version

v1.1
- Added notification option to display a notification when auto-looting
- Added configuration for notifications (NOTE: If you have already picked up the config book, you may have to spawn a new copy of it for the notification configuration to work correctly.)
- *technical* Added debug notification global flag
- *technical* Removed hardcoded config message step numbers

v1.2
- Added spell \"Exclude Location (Toggle)\" which allows a player to turn auto-looting on and off in a location

v1.2.1
- Modified logic involving the max number of items to attempt to take.

*****

Future Updates:
- Add config option/logic for minimum arrow damage to pick up (i.e. Dwarven and above, etc)
- WISHFUL: Add ability for a player to add an item to a custom auto-loot list
- WISHFUL: Automatically loot
- WISHFUL: Close loot window automatically if empty after auto-loot

Please comment with any questions, feedback, requests, or bug reports! ESPECIALLY if you find yourself auto-looting something you shouldn\'t be, or from someone you shouldn\'t be.
